GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of the article with the article_id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for an article related to the article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: inserts a comment into the array for the article related to the article id and returns the comment back.

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: recieves an object with key inc_votes and changes increments the votes on the article related to article_id

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the comment related to the comment id
